item.title: “Come unto Me with Full Purpose of Heart, and I Shall Heal You”
item.description:
“Come unto Me with Full Purpose of Heart, and I Shall Heal You” by Elder Patrick Kearon, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 180th Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 2010
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Patrick Kearon, Of the Seventy
